caller_intent: The caller needs to return a signed form within three days but is concerned about mail delays and is seeking alternative arrangements to meet the deadline.
resolution_steps: Agent confirmed the form requires a signature and explained the mail delay issue.
Agent suggested an in-person visit on Tuesday morning to avoid delays.
Caller agreed to meet in person at the office on Tuesday at 8:30 AM.
knowledge_required: Understanding of form submission deadlines and mail processing times
Ability to coordinate in-person meetings for document signing
summary: The caller discussed a missing signature on a form and concerns about returning it via mail due to local postal delays. The agent resolved the issue by arranging an in-person meeting on Tuesday morning to ensure the form is submitted on time. The caller agreed to this solution.
